brand.description:
Noel Edmonds’ Billionz Club

This is my Billionz Club, featuring tracks that shaped decades, songs that shattered records, and legends that live forever.

Across the generations, a handful of truly iconic tracks have soared past one billion streams—a number that would have been unimaginable when I first started spinning records on BBC Radio 1 back in the day.

From Queen’s "Bohemian Rhapsody" to Fleetwood Mac’s "Dreams", to more recent anthems like Coldplay’s "Yellow", the music that defined each era still finds a way to unite new listeners and smash global records decades later.

For me, these milestones aren’t just about big numbers. They’re about timeless music, unforgettable moments, and the energy, escapism, and memories that only great music can deliver.

Decade after decade, the true anthems don’t fade—they just grow stronger. And now, with more than a billion streams behind them, they’ve officially earned their place in the history books.

I’m proud to celebrate these legends and invite you to join me in the Noel Edmonds’ Billionz Club. Because when the music’s this good, there’s always room for more.

Some of the Timeless Tracks You’ll Hear on Noel Edmonds’ Billionz Club

Here is a selection of songs that have each surpassed a billion streams:

  • "Blinding Lights" – The Weeknd
  • "Shape of You" – Ed Sheeran
  • "Someone You Loved" – Lewis Capaldi
  • "Starboy" – The Weeknd & Daft Punk
  • "As It Was" – Harry Styles
  • "Sunflower" – Post Malone & Swae Lee
  • "One Dance" – Drake featuring Wizkid & Kyla
  • "Stay" – The Kid LAROI & Justin Bieber
  • "Perfect" – Ed Sheeran
  • "Believer" – Imagine Dragons
  • "Heat Waves" – Glass Animals
  • "Lovely" – Billie Eilish & Khalid
  • "Closer" – The Chainsmokers & Halsey
  • "Dance Monkey" – Tones and I
  • "Say You Won't Let Go" – James Arthur
  • "Sweater Weather" – The Neighbourhood
  • "Bad Guy" – Billie Eilish
  • "Levitating" – Dua Lipa
  • "Good 4 U" – Olivia Rodrigo
  • "Drivers License" – Olivia Rodrigo
  • "Montero (Call Me By Your Name)" – Lil Nas X
  • "Old Town Road – Remix" – Lil Nas X & Billy Ray Cyrus
  • "7 Rings" – Ariana Grande
  • "God's Plan" – Drake
  • "Rockstar" – Post Malone featuring 21 Savage
  • "Psycho" – Post Malone featuring Ty Dolla $ign
  • "In My Feelings" – Drake
  • "Despacito (Remix)" – Luis Fonsi, Daddy Yankee & Justin Bieber
  • "Something Just Like This" – The Chainsmokers & Coldplay
  • "I'm the One" – DJ Khaled featuring Justin Bieber, Chance the Rapper, Quavo & Lil Wayne
  • "Without Me" – Eminem
  • "Bohemian Rhapsody" – Queen
  • "Every Breath You Take" – The Police
  • "Yellow" – Coldplay
  • "Viva La Vida" – Coldplay
  • "Dreams" – Fleetwood Mac
  • "Sweet Child O' Mine" – Guns N' Roses
  • "Creep" – Radiohead
  • "Do I Wanna Know?" – Arctic Monkeys
  • "Locked Out of Heaven" – Bruno Mars
  • "That's What I Like" – Bruno Mars
  • "When I Was Your Man" – Bruno Mars
  • "Unwritten" – Natasha Bedingfield
  • "Give Me Everything" – Pitbull featuring Ne-Yo, Afrojack & Nayer
  • "LA CANCIÓN" – J Balvin & Bad Bunny
  • "Snooze" – SZA
  • "Pink + White" – Frank Ocean
  • "My Love Mine All Mine" – Mitski
  • "Gata Only" – FloyyMenor & Cris Mj
  • "Cruel Summer" – Taylor Swift

These songs are just a taste of the musical legends celebrated on Noel Edmonds’ Billionz Club. We’re constantly updating the playlist with new tracks that hit the billion-stream milestone—so you’re always listening to the greatest of all time.

If we’ve missed a track you love, tell us!

Because the Billionz Club isn’t just a playlist; it’s a living, growing celebration of the music that changed everything. And once you're in, you're in good company.
brand.meta_description: Experience a collection of songs that have each surpassed one billion streams—a testament to their global resonance and enduring popularity.
brand.name: Noel Edmonds’ Billionz Club
